name: Destiny Saga
storyline: Sixteen years ago, the Montereys continent suffered a disaster from the Xorc crisis. The protagonist Rosen, with only a clue - a core chip from sixteen years ago, explores the continent again with his friends, trying to find out the cause of the crisis.
summary: Sixteen years ago, the Montereys continent suffered a disaster from the Xorc crisis. The protagonist Rosen, with only a clue - a core chip from sixteen years ago, explores the continent again with his friends, trying to find out the cause of the crisis.
